name: duckduckgo
description: Search DuckDuckGo and return formatted results. Fetch and parse content from a webpage URL.

commands.name: search
commands.description: Search DuckDuckGo and return formatted results.

args.name: max_results
args.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

commands.name: fetch_content
commands.description: Fetch and parse content from a webpage URL.

args.name: url
args.description: The webpage URL to fetch content from
